name: Panzer Campaigns: Mius '43
summary:
Within days of the failure of the German strategic offensive at Kursk, the Soviets counterattacked the weakened Axis forces. The great operations at Orel and the 4th Battle of Kharkov were accompanied by a strong assault on the German defensive positions at the Mius River, on the Black Sea. These heavily fortified positions had been held by the Germans since the previous winter and any advance would be into heavily prepared defenses.

This free game is designed to showcase the Panzer Campaigns system. Be sure to use the Getting Started documentation to familiarize with the series.
